title: Ep. 159 S&A Investor - Tracking Holiday Sales With Retail Insiders
itunes:title: Tracking Holiday Sales With Retail Insiders
description: Britt Beemer, founder and CEO of America's Research Group, tells us where consumers will be shopping this holiday season and what companies will benefit. Kristin Bentz, director of PMG Venture Group, breaks down the winners and losers in retail following Black Friday.
content:encoded: Britt Beemer, founder and CEO of America's Research Group, tells us where consumers will be shopping this holiday season and what companies will benefit. Kristin Bentz, director of PMG Venture Group, breaks down the winners and losers in retail following Black Friday.
